description:
It`s spring and the clubs are recruiting new students. Ritsu Tainaka drags her childhood friend Mio Akiyama along to check out the Light Music Club, but all of the members have graduated. Unless four new members join, the club will be no more. After managing to persuade Tsumugi Kotobuki, who actually planned to join the choir, they just have to find one more member...
Source: R1 DVD
